description: Predictive maintenance system leveraging sensors, smart algorithms, and real-time monitoring to prevent machine failures at L&T Hazira Plant.
features: Anomaly Detection
Real-time Monitoring
Predictive Analytics
Sensor Integration

content.overview: In the ever-evolving industrial landscape, machine downtime can be a costly affair. At L&T Hazira, we successfully implemented a predictive maintenance system that leverages cutting-edge technology to ensure operational efficiency and minimize unexpected machine breakdowns.

sections.title: üîß Sensor Integration & Data Collection
sections.content: Each machine is equipped with a variety of sensors to capture vital parameters including vibration, temperature, pressure, and many more critical metrics for comprehensive monitoring.
features: Multi-parameter sensor integration (vibration, temperature, pressure)
Real-time data collection from critical machine components
High-frequency data sampling for accurate monitoring
Sensor calibration and maintenance protocols

sections.title: üß† Smart Algorithm Processing
sections.content: The sensor data is transmitted in real-time to a LimePi Zero, a compact yet powerful custom-made gateway device. This device processes the data every second using advanced algorithms.
features: LimePi Zero gateway for real-time data processing
Advanced anomaly detection algorithms
Machine learning models for pattern recognition
Automated threshold analysis and trend detection

sections.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Anomaly Detection & Alerts
sections.content: Custom-built algorithms analyze incoming data to detect any anomalies. When irregularities are identified, the system automatically triggers alarms and alerts, notifying operators about potential issues.
features: Real-time anomaly detection with custom algorithms
Automated alarm generation for critical thresholds
Multi-channel alert system (email, SMS, dashboard)
Escalation protocols for critical maintenance events

sections.title: üìä Real-Time Monitoring Dashboard
sections.content: The processed data is visualized on a custom-built web application offering real-time monitoring, user-friendly dashboards, and historical data analysis to identify patterns and trends.
features: Real-time monitoring of all critical machine parameters
Intuitive dashboards with innovative data visualization
Historical data analysis and trend identification
Comprehensive reporting and analytics capabilities

Dashboard: Historical Analysis - Trend and pattern insights

businessImpact: Reduced machine downtime through early detection of issues
Cost savings from proactive maintenance vs reactive repairs
Improved safety through real-time monitoring of critical parameters
Enhanced decision-making with data-driven maintenance insights
